= Como crear un portal cautivo=

Pasos:
  # cambiar configuracion interface
  # arrancar hostapd -d /etc/hostapd/hostapd.conf
  # Arrarcar  bash redirect_trafic.sh
  # arrancar:  dnsmasq -dq

== Configuraciones ==
nuevas interfaces:
<code>
allow-hotplug wlan0

iface wlan0 inet static

address 192.168.42.1
netmask 255.255.255.0
gateway 19.168.1.1

</code>

/etc/hostapd/hostapd.conf
<code>
interface=wlan0
#driver=nl80211
#driver=rtl871xdrv
ssid=My_AP
hw_mode=g
channel=6
auth_algs=1
wmm_enabled=0
</code>

/etc/dnsmasq.conf
<code>

interface=wlan0
#driver=nl80211
#driver=rtl871xdrv
ssid=My_AP
hw_mode=g
channel=6
auth_algs=1
wmm_enabled=0

</code>

redirect_trafic.sh
<code>
sudo iptables -t mangle -N internet
sudo iptables -t mangle -A PREROUTING -p tcp -i wlan0 --dport 443 -j internet
sudo iptables -t mangle -A PREROUTING -p tcp -i wlan0 --dport 80 -j internet
sudo iptables -t mangle -A internet -j MARK --set-mark 99
sudo iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i wlan0 -p tcp -m mark --mark 99 --dport 80 -j DNAT --to-destination 192.168.42.1

</code>
